about_the_game:
Welcome to City Slickers, the ultimate party sandbox game that lets you unleash your inner chaos! Immerse yourself in a bustling city filled with cars, planes, boats, and NPCs, or choose from a variety of fun minigames like skating, racing, cooking, farming, or even a demolition derby!




City Slickers features an advanced active-ragdoll system that simulates realistic limb movement using physics, allowing you to grab and interact with the environment in any way you choose. With the ability to damage and even sever limbs (don't worry, they reattach), every encounter with the environment and other players is a unique experience.



The city is your playground in City Slickers, and with a massive variety of props to interact with from gas canisters to grappling hooks, balloon guns, giant hammers, and even a Ferris wheel, you'll never run out of new and creative ways to cause chaos. Use cars and trucks as giant wrecking balls, strap balloons to NPCs and watch them go flying, or try to ride a skateboard down a flight of stairs - the possibilities are endless!



But the real magic of City Slickers lies in its support for up to 4 players, allowing you and your friends to work together to create chaos on an even bigger scale. Combine your skills to create massive pileups, land a plane on the train, or compete against each other and steal your friend's leg as you watch them hobble after you!



Featuring cute, stylized graphics and hilarious physics to keep you laughing, City Slickers is the ultimate sandbox experience for those who love to explore and mess around. With its endless possibilities for fun and creativity, as well as additional minigames and objectives to earn some coin, this is a game that you'll keep coming back to time and time again.



So whether you're looking to cause chaos with your friends, complete jobs or minigames, or simply explore and mess around in a physics-based sandbox environment, there is something for everyone. Gather your friends and get ready to unleash your inner chaos in the endlessly entertaining world of City Slickers!

name: City Slickers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9300 (4 * 2500) or equivalent | AMD A10-5800K APU (4*3800) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 7770 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: The ultimate physics-based party / sandbox game for you and up to 4 friends! Steal your friend's limbs as they hobble after you, strap balloons to NPCs and watch them fly away, or even land a plane on a moving train! Explore fun minigames from skating, cooking, racing, to farming and mining!
